item.title: About me
item.description: TL;DR Work-related interests: Currently designing a commercial cubesat platform at SatRevolution Playing around with UAVs - MavLink, ArduPilot & DroneKit Vice president of the Academic Aviation Club Writing automation & testing scripts mainly in Python & Bash Extensive Linux knowledge (long time power user, ricing enthusiast) Solid understanding of C++ and low-level, planning to learn Rust Web services and web apps with Flask and Django Other interests: Hard sci-fi Lots of music, weird sounds Random philosophical ideas UAVs Since 2019, I’ve been rolling with the Academic Aviation Club - a student club from my uni, dedicated to developing autonomous airplanes and drones.

item.title: About me, but not about programming
item.description: Music I’ve been through a music school, learning piano for 6 years (also boosting my typing speed, which came in handy later). I spend most of my time with music, exploring interesting genres and artists. Artists I love: Kate Bush Son Lux Leonard Cohen Peter Gabriel Artists I really really like: The Cure Depeche Mode Vulfpeck Yazoo The Punch Brothers Honorable mentions: Bryan Ferry Radiohead 21 Pilots Books Anything by Jacek Dukaj Brave New World Neuromancer Simulacra and Simulation 1984 His Master’s Voice The End of Faith The Screwtape Letters Movies/shows: Evangelion Blade Runner Westworld Serial Experiments Lain Donnie Darko Ghost In The Shell
